title: Pig Iron Production for France
notes:
Alsace-Lorraine Is Covered From 1871-1918. Source: Ministre Des Travaux Publics, Direction Des Mines, "Statistique De L'Industrie Minerale", 1870 And Following Issues (Checked With Annuaire Statistique, 1935, Pp. 80-81).
